mugs.name: Classic White Ceramic Mug
mugs.description: The timeless Starbucks classic white ceramic mug. Features the iconic Starbucks siren logo and holds 11 oz of your favorite beverage. Dishwasher safe.

mugs.name: Pike Place Roast Mug
mugs.description: Inspired by the original Pike Place Market store in Seattle. This 12 oz mug celebrates Starbucks' roots with a vintage-style illustration. Microwave safe.

mugs.name: Holiday Season Tumbler
mugs.description: Limited edition holiday mug featuring festive red designs and snowflake patterns. Double-wall insulated to keep drinks warm longer. Holds 16 oz.

mugs.name: City Collection: Seattle
mugs.description: Part of the exclusive Starbucks City Collection. This Seattle mug showcases the Space Needle and downtown skyline. A must-have for travelers and collectors. 14 oz capacity.

mugs.name: Reserve Roastery Mug
mugs.description: Premium matte black mug from the Starbucks Reserve Roastery line. Features copper accent detailing and the Reserve logo. Perfect for specialty coffee enthusiasts. 12 oz.

mugs.name: You Are Here Collection
mugs.description: The beloved You Are Here series captures iconic landmarks and cultural elements from around the world. Each mug tells a unique story. 14 oz, ceramic with colorful glaze.

mugs.name: City Collection: New York
mugs.description: Celebrate the Big Apple with this vibrant City Collection mug featuring the iconic Manhattan skyline, Statue of Liberty, and New York landmarks. 14 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: City Collection: Chicago
mugs.description: Showcase the Windy City's iconic architecture with this City Collection mug. Features the Willis Tower, Navy Pier, and Chicago River illustrations. 14 oz.

mugs.name: City Collection: San Francisco
mugs.description: A tribute to the City by the Bay. Features the Golden Gate Bridge, cable cars, and rolling hills of San Francisco. 14 oz ceramic, dishwasher safe.

mugs.name: City Collection: Los Angeles
mugs.description: Soak up the sun with this City Collection mug celebrating LA's iconic palm trees, Hollywood sign, and Pacific coastline. 14 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: City Collection: Paris
mugs.description: C'est magnifique! This City Collection mug features the Eiffel Tower, Arc de Triomphe, and Parisian café culture. A collector's dream. 14 oz.

mugs.name: City Collection: Tokyo
mugs.description: Experience the vibrant energy of Tokyo with this City Collection mug. Features Tokyo Tower, cherry blossoms, and modern cityscape. 14 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: City Collection: London
mugs.description: Cheerio! This City Collection mug celebrates London's Big Ben, Tower Bridge, and classic red double-decker buses. A proper British keepsake. 14 oz.

mugs.name: City Collection: Miami
mugs.description: Feel the heat with this City Collection mug showcasing Miami's Art Deco architecture, South Beach, and vibrant nightlife. 14 oz ceramic, microwave safe.

mugs.name: City Collection: New Orleans
mugs.description: Laissez les bons temps rouler! This mug captures the jazz, Mardi Gras spirit, and iconic French Quarter architecture of New Orleans. 14 oz.

mugs.name: Holiday Christmas Morning Mug
mugs.description: Wake up to holiday magic with this festive ceramic mug adorned with Christmas trees, gifts, and a cozy winter scene. Limited edition, 12 oz.

mugs.name: Holiday Valentine's Day Mug
mugs.description: Share the love with this Valentine's Day edition mug featuring hearts, roses, and a warm pink palette. The perfect gift for a coffee lover. 12 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: Holiday Spring Siren Mug
mugs.description: Celebrate spring with this pastel-hued mug featuring blooming flowers, butterflies, and a festive Siren illustration. Limited edition, 14 oz.

mugs.name: Holiday Halloween Mug
mugs.description: Trick or treat! This spooky Halloween mug features pumpkins, bats, and a Starbucks Siren in costume. Perfect for your favorite witches' brew. 12 oz.

mugs.name: Holiday New Year's Eve Mug
mugs.description: Ring in the New Year with this sparkling mug adorned with fireworks, champagne bubbles, and gold foil accents. Limited edition 14 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: Holiday Thanksgiving Harvest Mug
mugs.description: Give thanks with this warm autumnal mug featuring harvest pumpkins, maple leaves, and a cozy fall color palette. 14 oz ceramic, limited edition.

mugs.name: Holiday Winter Wonderland Mug
mugs.description: Get lost in a winter wonderland with this enchanting mug featuring snowflakes, pine trees, and a serene snowy landscape. Limited edition, 12 oz.

mugs.name: You Are Here: United States
mugs.description: A colorful tribute to the United States featuring iconic American landmarks, the Statue of Liberty, Route 66 sign, and bald eagle. 14 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: You Are Here: Paris
mugs.description: Ooh la la! This You Are Here Paris mug features the Eiffel Tower, macarons, French fashion, and the Seine River. A Parisian dream in ceramic. 14 oz.

mugs.name: You Are Here: London
mugs.description: Keep calm and drink coffee! This You Are Here London mug captures Big Ben, the red phone box, and classic British culture. 14 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: You Are Here: Tokyo
mugs.description: Konnichiwa! This You Are Here Tokyo mug features Mount Fuji, cherry blossoms, sushi, and vibrant neon signs. A colorful homage to Japan's capital. 14 oz.

mugs.name: You Are Here: Rome
mugs.description: All roads lead to Rome—and to great coffee! This You Are Here mug features the Colosseum, Trevi Fountain, and classic Italian imagery. 14 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: You Are Here: Sydney
mugs.description: G'day mate! This You Are Here Sydney mug celebrates the Opera House, Harbour Bridge, kangaroos, and the Great Barrier Reef. 14 oz.

mugs.name: You Are Here: Mexico City
mugs.description: ¡Viva México! This colorful You Are Here mug features Aztec pyramids, marigolds, folk art patterns, and vibrant Mexican culture. 14 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: Reserve Black Gold Mug
mugs.description: Luxury meets craftsmanship in this Reserve Black Gold mug. Matte black finish with 24k gold foil Reserve logo and lettering. Limited edition collector piece. 12 oz.

mugs.name: Reserve Copper Series Mug
mugs.description: The Reserve Copper Series mug showcases a rich copper glaze finish with the iconic Reserve Roastery emblem. A sophisticated addition to any collection. 12 oz.

mugs.name: Reserve Single Origin Ethiopia Mug
mugs.description: Celebrating the birthplace of coffee, this Reserve mug features Ethiopian Yirgacheffe-inspired artwork and earthy terracotta tones. 12 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: Reserve Seattle Roastery Mug
mugs.description: An exclusive mug from the Seattle Reserve Roastery flagship store. Features the original cask design and roastery warehouse illustration. 14 oz, dishwasher safe.

mugs.name: Reserve Milan Roastery Mug
mugs.description: From the stunning Milan Reserve Roastery, this mug features Italian marble-inspired design and architectural elements of the Piazza Cordusio location. 14 oz.

mugs.name: Siren Black Ceramic Mug
mugs.description: A bold take on the classic Siren mug in deep glossy black with the iconic white Starbucks Siren logo. Timeless, elegant, and perfect for any coffee ritual. 11 oz.

mugs.name: Siren Gold Ceramic Mug
mugs.description: Shine bright with the Siren Gold mug, featuring a lustrous golden finish and embossed Siren logo. Makes a stunning gift or statement piece. 11 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: Siren Silver Ceramic Mug
mugs.description: Sleek and sophisticated, the Siren Silver mug features a metallic silver glaze with the classic Siren logo. A modern heirloom for coffee lovers. 11 oz.

mugs.name: Siren Rose Gold Mug
mugs.description: Blush meets beauty in this limited edition Rose Gold Siren mug. The warm pink-gold finish with white Siren logo is an Instagram-worthy must-have. 11 oz.

mugs.name: Siren Limited Edition Mosaic Mug
mugs.description: An artisan mosaic design celebrating the Siren with hand-painted tile-inspired patterns in jewel tones. Each mug is individually finished. 12 oz, limited edition.

mugs.name: Siren Ombré Mug
mugs.description: A gradient of color flows from deep teal to pale aqua on this Siren Ombré mug. The Siren logo gleams in contrasting white. 12 oz, dishwasher safe.

mugs.name: Siren Pearl Collection Mug
mugs.description: An iridescent pearl-white finish gives this Siren Collection mug an ethereal quality. The Siren logo shimmers in opalescent detail. 12 oz, limited edition.

mugs.name: 25th Anniversary Mug
mugs.description: Commemorating 25 years of Starbucks, this collector mug features the evolution of the Siren logo and a golden anniversary emblem. A piece of coffee history. 12 oz.

mugs.name: 30th Anniversary Mug
mugs.description: Three decades of coffee excellence celebrated in this commemorative 30th Anniversary mug. Features the original brown Siren logo alongside the modern icon. 12 oz.

mugs.name: 40th Anniversary Mug
mugs.description: Mark four decades of Starbucks innovation with this collector-grade 40th Anniversary mug. Features the iconic refreshed Siren logo unveiled in 2011. 14 oz.

mugs.name: 50th Anniversary Gold Mug
mugs.description: A golden celebration of 50 years of Starbucks. This premium commemorative mug features gold foil accents, the 1971 Siren, and a special 50th emblem. 14 oz.

mugs.name: 53rd Anniversary Mug
mugs.description: Celebrating 53 years of Starbucks coffee culture with a clean, contemporary design that honors the brand's heritage and forward-looking spirit. 12 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: Dot Collection White Mug
mugs.description: Clean and minimalist, the Dot Collection White mug features a subtle white-on-white polka dot texture with the Starbucks logo embossed at the center. 14 oz.

mugs.name: Dot Collection Blue Mug
mugs.description: A calming ocean blue adorned with a playful polka dot texture and embossed Starbucks Siren logo. The Dot Collection Blue brings a pop of color to your morning ritual. 14 oz.

mugs.name: Dot Collection Green Mug
mugs.description: The iconic Starbucks green in a textured dot pattern. This Dot Collection Green mug is a love letter to the brand's signature color. Embossed Siren logo. 14 oz.

mugs.name: Dot Collection Pink Mug
mugs.description: Soft blush pink meets playful polka dots in this charming Dot Collection mug. Features the embossed Siren logo and a cheerful, feminine design. 14 oz ceramic.

mugs.name: Dot Collection Black Mug
mugs.description: Bold and dramatic, the Dot Collection Black mug features a matte black finish with raised white polka dots and an embossed Starbucks logo. 14 oz.

mugs.name: Dot Collection Gold Mug
mugs.description: Glamorous and eye-catching, the limited edition Dot Collection Gold mug features a champagne gold glaze with raised dot texture and embossed Siren logo. 14 oz.
